item.title: Yakuza 0 Director's Cut
item.description:
Title: Yakuza 0 Director's Cut
Genre: Action , Adventure , RPG
Developer: Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio
Publisher: SEGA
Franchise: Yakuza
Release Date: Dec 8, 2025




About This Game

Yakuza 0 Director's Cut is the definitive edition of the critically acclaimed prequel to the Yakuza series.

Fight like hell through Tokyo and Osaka entertainment districts as yakuza Kazuma Kiryu and cabaret club manager Goro Majima in an epic crime drama of intertwined fates that created legends.

■ CREATIVELY CRUSH ENEMIES
Kiryu and Majima each have three unique fighting styles to dynamically switch between to creatively crack skulls with your fists, makeshift weapons and more. Anyone can enjoy exhilarating brawler action with easy-to-pick-up controls and a high skill ceiling.

■ DISCOVER THE DECADENCE OF 1988 JAPAN

Fighting isn't the only way to kill time in 1988 Japan: from discos and darts to classic SEGA arcades and cabaret clubs, there's endless distractions to pursue in the immersive, neon-lit city.

■ DIVE DEEPER WITH DIRECTOR'S CUT CONTENT
Director's Cut content gives deeper insight into key incidents and character backstories with never-before-seen cutscenes. Plus, the Red Light Raid online multiplayer mode lets you join forces with friends and choose from 60 playable characters to take down hordes of enemies.

*If you have the digital download version of Yakuza 0 , you can get the digital download version of Yakuza 0 Director's Cut at a discounted price.

* Yakuza 0 and Yakuza 0 Director's Cut have differing specifications and cannot carryover save data.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Some Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

item.title: Skate Story
item.description:
Title: Skate Story
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , RPG , Sports
Developer: by Sam Eng
Publisher: Devolver Digital
Franchise: Devolver Digital
Release Date: Dec 8, 2025




About This Game

You are a demon in the Underworld, made out of glass and pain. The Devil has given you a skateboard with a simple deal: Skate to the Moon and swallow it — and you shall be freed.

Ollie, kickflip, and grind your way through the ash and smoke of The Emptylands as you take on a seemingly impossible quest. Learn to master your weight and motion to conquer the weeping concrete. Savour the ritualistic beauty as you set your feet to pop a perfect kickflip.

Skate fast to destroy vicious demons, help a forgetful frog, and save other tortured souls on your journey from fragile beginner to hardened skater. Push through hell and discover The Devil’s greatest weakness: humility, perseverance, and a disgustingly sweet backside tailslide.

All you need is your skateboard.

Stylish Street Skating Adventure

Skate through nine layers of The Underworld. Cruise through streets and surreal landscapes full of waxed ledges, unholy gaps, and tortured demons. Push your way through precarious paths and shred freeform skate spots. Discover and create your own challenges as you explore the world and master your board.

Succumb To The Beauty of The Board

Sell your soul for decks, wheels, and trucks to keep your skating fresh. Over 70+ skate tricks to progress and improve. Complete skate trials to level up, learn new tricks, and get new gear. Destroy vicious demons with your 360 flip… or at least impress them.

Hypnotic Beats for Demonic Streets

Cruise through The Underworld to a psychedelic soundtrack by enigmatic New York artist Blood Cultures, and additional tracks by John Fio.

item.title: Angeline Era
item.description:
Title: Angeline Era
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie
Developer: Melos Han-Tani , Marina Kittaka , Analgesic Productions
Publisher: Analgesic Productions
Release Date: Dec 8, 2025




About This Game

Pick up your sword and hit the road!

Every level is hidden in plain sight in this nonlinear 3D Action-Adventure game! Travel a vast country's unmarked overworld in search of the next challenging fight, humorous encounter, or mysterious landscape. YOU decide what you discover next in this world of Fae, Humans and Angels!

The Angel's mothership, Throne, lays dormant behind a fierce storm. To reach it, unlock its secrets, and usher in the future, you must explore the land of Era and survive its trap-filled ruins, primordial forests, treacherous mountains, mines, and more! Overcome intense battles and hilarious hazards in this tale of betrayal, haunting lore, and fruitless yearning.

Hello, devs Melos and Marina here. Today, our hero Tets, and his ally Arkas will introduce the game, alongside the villainous Niamh!

Unique "Bumpslash" combat is easy to learn... but don't get cocky!

TETS: I’ve spent many years practicing the Art of Bumpslash — just bump me into enemies to automatically attack! It's fast-paced, and you’ll pick it up in no time!

PRINCESS NIAMH: HAHAHAHA!! Tets, my dear... aren’t you giving them false hope? After all, the Fae spirit “Melos” has prepared many vicious and hilarious tricks to guard our ancient secrets! My heart swells thinking of the suffering that awaits these unsuspecting players!

A vast world, brimming with secrets!

ANGEL ARKAS: Don’t forget the bigger picture: a vast world map you can search to find levels and zones. Follow your instincts to chart a flexible path. Go at your own pace — follow your spirit! Life's not a checklist, it’s an experience!!

A woven myth... arcane and emotional!

TETS: Agreed! I can’t wait to escape into this world’s haunting lore , woven from Irish mythology, early Christian philosophy, and Japanese American history. By poring over ancient texts and researching on-location, Melos and Marina have grounded their world in truth!

ANGEL ARKAS: Truth is not limited to dusty details, Tets. You've forgotten about Angeline Era's tales of fruitless yearning, life-shattering betrayal and unsettling beauty ! Only the truths of the heart will bring forth the future...

PRINCESS NIAMH: What on earth are you two going on about? This is an action game. KILL, KILL!!

Features

  • Every level is hidden in plain sight in this nonlinear Action-Adventure game! Travel a vast country's unmarked overworld in search of the next challenging fight, humorous encounter, or mysterious landscape. YOU decide what you discover next in this world of Fae, Humans and Angels!

  • "Bump the World!" with intuitive Bumpslash Combat . Walk into enemies to attack - no button needed! Fast-paced action levels AND exploration-and-lore focused levels will test your skills.

  • Explore fearsome Fae forests, condemned buildings, trap-filled farms, spiritual mountains sites, mines, towns, and more!

  • Fierce and uniquely designed bosses and enemies that will test your Bumpslash skills

  • Follow wandering ex-soldier, Tets Kinoshta, as he allies with the Angel, Arkas Gemini, attempting to breach the storm guarding Throne: the Angel's crashed mothership. Will they unlock its secrets?

  • Plenty of levels, each offering glimpses into the Fae, Angels and Humans living together in the country of Era.

  • Mix up combat with subweapons and a gun, and visit towns to shop for items. Beat levels to get Scales and level up!

  • On average, a first playthrough takes 20-30 hours, depending on how much of the world you want to explore and how fast you play. (Rushed playthroughs may be less, thorough may be more)

  • Low-difficulty setting for Beginner Bumpslashers, and nightmarish settings for the deranged!

  • From Anodyne 2 and Sephonie's devs, Melos and Marina.

item.title: Light Up The Town
item.description:
Title: Light Up The Town
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation
Developer: Meadow Studios
Publisher: Meadow Studios
Release Date: Dec 6, 2025




About This Game

Light Up The Town is a cozy, casual game about spreading holiday cheer in a wintery town. Play as Bean , a young ferret tasked with putting up lights and decorations around Bellflower, Colorado in time for the Winter Festival.

Gameplay

  • Click anywhere to throw string lights and decorations, and light up 15+ handcrafted levels.

  • Decorate any way you want to, customizing size and rotation of decorations.

  • Collect coins around town to unlock even more lights and decorations.

Story

Bellflower's annual Winter Festival is coming up, but the town is still dark! Local electrician Chuck is out of commission, so it's up to his precocious daughter Bean to put up lights and decorations around town before the festival. And with a blizzard on the way, the holidays hang in the balance. What does it take to make your community a better place?
